title: Alex Jones Show - 2010 Dec 08 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Wednesday, 08 December 2010


[sebaygo1]


Scheduled Guests
................

From the Infowars web site ::

Alex welcomes to the show Joseph Mercola, an osteopathic physician, health activist, and entrepreneur. Mercola criticizes many of the practices of mainstream medicine and the Food and Drug Administration, particularly vaccination and the use of prescription drugs and surgery to treat diseases. He encourages using water filters to purify drinking water and is strongly opposed to water fluoridation. 
[hour 2, first half of hour 3]
 <a href="
http://www.mercola.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.mercola.com/</a>



Alex also talks with Colorado attorney Gary Fielder who has filed a lawsuit under the Fourth Amendment against the TSA and the Department of Homeland Security over the use of naked body scanners.
[last 10 minutes of hour 1, first 5 minutes of hour 2]
 <a href="
http://blogs.westword.com/latestword/2010/12/gary_fielder_read_tsa_lawsuit_see_co_lawyer_refuse_body_scanning_and_pat-down_video.php" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://blogs.westword.com/latestword/2010/12/gary_fielder_read_tsa_lawsuit_see_co_lawyer_refuse_body_scanning_and_pat-down_video.php</a>
